Right now, after tonight's "dinner," I have no interest in ingesting meat ever again. But carnivorous habits are hard to break. But good Lord if anything can spur me on to vegetarianism it's SSA hot dogs.
I did 7 or 8 months of 2018 as vegetarian, and SSA hot dogs helped give me the gumption to do that. Some time in 2019, likely soon, I expect I'll go back to meatless eating.

Promise me that if I ever again purchase a hot dog on a Steamship Authority ferry you'll shun me. They're so awful. I've sworn off them many times only to relent when there's nothing else available on a late ferry home & I haven't eaten for 8 hours. My soul cries in horror.

@PrinceJvstin @SkiffyandFanty I saw MMMW when I was 10 years old on our annual class trip to New York City. I'm 66 & still remember how hard I laughed. I thought I was going to die. I couldn't catch my breath. 50%+ of the jokes went over my head, but even a 10-year-old gets the "kick the bucket" sight gag.
